properties.VolunteerActivity: Join one of Halswell Quarry's community planting days to help restore native wetland swales to the park. Hang out with friends, family and like minded folk while doing some good for the environment.
properties.What to bring: Bring clothes and a hat for all weather events, sturdy footwear and work gloves if you have them. Tools, sunscreen and some gloves supplied.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Head to Charlesworth Reserve for a community planting day or regular working bee.
properties.What to bring: Bring clothes and a hat for all weather events, sturdy footwear and work gloves if you have them. Tools, sunscreen and some gloves supplied.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Join Rangers at Roto Kohatu Reserve for a community planting event along the Otukaikino River.
properties.What to bring: Gardening gloves, a spade for planting, sturdy footwear and clothing suitable for all weather conditions.  Some tools are available for use."

properties.VolunteerActivity: Join Rangers at Styx Mill Reserve for their annual community planting day or join the Styx Living Laboratory Trust for bird and water quality monitoring every fortnight.
properties.What to bring: Gardening gloves, a spade for planting, sturdy footwear and clothing suitable for all weather conditions.  Some tools are available for use."

properties.VolunteerActivity: Help Council Rangers and the Avon Heathcote Estuary Ihutai Trust plant 500 native tree seedlings to beautify the park.
properties.What to bring: Your own gloves. Tools will be provided.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Help attract native birds back into the Southshore area by planting native plants as a food source.
properties.What to bring: Own gloves and spade if possible. Please wear closed footwear for safety.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Help restore the Port Hills at community planting and maintenance days.
properties.What to bring: Weather appropriate clothes and sturdy shoes. Tools and gloves provided.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Bring the family for community planting days and regular working bees at Travis - this important habitat was formed through community volunteering, join the fun!
properties.What to bring: Own gloves, sturdy footwear and weather appropriate clothes.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Join Avon-Ōtākaro Forest Park in planting 1500 trees in Brooker Reserve this winter.
properties.What to bring: Weather appropriate clothes and sturdy shoes. Tools and gloves provided.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Help out each month at McCormacks Bay with planting, litter removal and weeding.
properties.What to bring: Weather appropriate clothing, sturdy closed toe footwear. Tools and gloves supplied.

properties.VolunteerActivity: Help keep Bexley Park tidy. Depending on the season you might plant, weed, mulch, water or collect litter.utumn, winter and spring the work is focused on planting, weeding and mulching. Summer work involves weeding, watering and litter removal.
properties.What to bring: Weather appropriate clothing, sturdy closed toe footwear, bottle of water and snacks. Some gloves and spades are provided but bring your own if you can.
